snippet.title: Bille & Trille Wacky Woods
snippet.description:
Welcome to a world of fun and fantasy. Follow the twins and the crazy Fantasy Animal on a picnic full of pranks and pratfalls.
The kindergarten is going on a picnic in the woods, and of course the double trouble twins together with all their friends are going along with the nutty Fantasy Animal. You will recognise most of the things in the woods until the Fantasy Animal is let out, then strange and magical things start to happen.

The Fantasy Animal always accompanies the kids. It gives you the choice between activities that you would ordinarily do in the woods and of playing fantasy games that involves using your imagination. By clicking on the fantasy animal you transform the forest into a playground for the imagination.

Find Bille & Trille Wacky Woods on Android:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=dk.savanah.billetrille&hl=uk

And on iOS;
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/bille-trille/id1628582250
